doc:
John Derek https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Derek 0 John Derek (born Derek Delevan Harris; August 12, 1926 – May 22, 1998) was an American actor, director and photographer. He appeared in such films as Knock on Any Door, All the King's Men, and Rogues of Sherwood Forest. He was also known for launching the career of his fourth wife, Bo Derek. John_Derek ( born Derek_Delevan_Harris ; August_12_,_1926 – May_22_,_1998 ) was an_American_actor_,_director_and_photographer . He appeared in such_films as Knock on Any_Door , All the_King 's_Men , and Rogues of Sherwood_Forest . He was_also_known for launching the_career of his_fourth_wife , Bo_Derek .
